summary: Grants a permission set on a user
description: Inserts a new permission set grant entry on user.

user_ids.description: An array containing identifiers of the platform users being granted.

valid_after.description: The duration grant will be valid after.

valid_for.description: The duration grant will remain valid for.

email.description: Notifies user with a mail. **Costs 2n-mails for number of the user group if deferral applied, otherwise n-mails.**

sms.description: Notifies user with an SMS message. **Costs n-SMSs for number of the user group.**

push_notification.description: Sends a push notification to the mobile devices of the users.

404.description: One of the users cannot be found.
